Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: On-demand feedback is good, even if it’s less reliable than staff grading

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: ML tools can go on forever (good), but don’t necessarily reference against the rubric the best. This gives me some uncertainly. That said, grading always has a pinch of subjectivity anyways

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: My university has stripped the budget to shit, and now we are understaffed. I have to rely on the Internet and my peers for my work.
